amr:
# ::snt Prayers too Rosario and family.
(p / pray-01
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Rosario"))
            :op2 (f / family))
      :mod (t / too))

# ::snt Condolence to the family
(c / condolence
      :beneficiary (f / family))

# ::snt My condolences to the family.
(o / offer-01
      :ARG0 (ii / i)
      :ARG1 (c / condolence
            :poss ii)
      :ARG3 (f / family))

comment: Sorry for your loss! May God comfort, and keep you in your time of sorrow!
amr:
# ::snt Sorry for your loss! May God comfort, and keep you in your time of sorrow!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / sorry-01
            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (l / lose-02
                  :ARG0 (y / you)))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (w / wish-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (c / comfort-01
                        :ARG1 (y2 / you))
                  :ARG2 y2)
            :op2 (k / keep-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "God"))
                  :ARG1 y2
                  :time (s2 / sorrow-01
                        :ARG0 y2))))
